Игра, несмотря на свой возраст, до сих пор годна. Интересные миссии, хорошая кампания, но при этом совсем печалька с серверами. Фанатам кс - рекомендую. Хотя думаю у многих эта игра появилась из Valve Pack'а.
Да это шедевр нулевых

Counter Strike Condition Zero is the 2nd best game i've ever played.
CS:CZ has good bot support and a VERY good single-player campaign that isn't even DLC.
When you download the game Deleted Scenes (single-player campaign) automaticly apeares in your library.
To be honest, the single-player campaign is probably the best thing about the game.
This is a very good game, and I hope valve would take inspiration from this game with their new CS game.

曾几何时，在网吧昏暗的灯光下，这个游戏让我领略到了人外有人，天外有天，BOT外有“别人家的BOT”，那时候的我下定决心苦练技术，后来大家都去玩CF了。。。。。。。直到上个星期，我在STEAM发现了这款游戏，小样，让你看看我苦练多年的技术！
20分钟后 



妈妈，我以后再也不玩CZ了！
CS已经不是当年的CS了，专家级BOT永远都是专家级。。。

-fajne spluwy :D

Minusy:
-Przejście wszystkich misji FPSowemu wyjadaczowi zajmnie około 1.5 H
-dużo cheaterów na multiplayer
-cena 36zł

Ocena ogólna = 6.5/10

Игра, несмотря на свой возраст, до сих пор годна. Интересные миссии, хорошая кампания, но при этом совсем печалька с серверами. Фанатам кс - рекомендую. Хотя думаю у многих эта игра появилась из Valve Pack'а.

Counter Strike Condition Zero:
+ A little modification of graphics in Gold Source Engine.
+ Good gameplay is fun like the previous  game Counter-Strike 1.6 but less players.
Edit:+ The singleplayer campaign is the first one in Counter-Strike series and is fun to play it.

I used to play this to practice agains expert bots. Still, can't beat the expert level of it. So, for casual gaming, I bought this for less than $1. Worth every penny. But still, I suck at FPS games. So, This game is a better chooice for me to play casual FPS gaming rather than CS:GO, CoD, Battlefield, or Arma III.

Another childhood memories in world of PC games. Nice product to have to complete your collection, especially FPS or Counter-Strike fans out there.

Most people might avoid this game since for one, its old, but it also has terrible graphics
However, the game really is fun to play, because (at least in my experience) its not as ragey as its older brother, cs:go. 
The game is simpler, easier to run, and has not only multiplayer, but a campaign mode which I have been having way to much fun with. I reccomend this if you can handle the graphics. If you're still not convinced, people still play this game.
